title: O’Connor Fined $1,000 for Missing Podium After Defending Vuelta Lead by 5 Seconds
content:
Despite another gutsy defense, Australian seems to accept that his chances of winning the Vuelta are diminishing by the day: 'I had no power.'

Read the full article at O’Connor Fined $1,000 for Missing Podium After Defending Vuelta Lead by 5 Seconds on Velo.
author: ahood
